channel.title: Hidden Pk || Oldschool || Daily updates || unique ideas come check out
channel.description:
[center]Place for Banner[/center]
[b]Introduction:[/b]
This is Hidden pk an old school based server where you can enjoy playing. The main reason why i'm starting this project is because there are a lot of servers with the new 634 items in it. I remember the days when playing was fun because there were no overpowered items, Wilderness was fun because it's welfare or barrows pk. And this is what i want to achieve back! A nice old school based server with active pking, bossing and skilling. I had projects started a few months back, but couldn't complete them because i had no time. But now i have enough time to complete this and keep this thread updated. [hr] [b]Progres:[/b]
red = not started yellow = in progress green = completed
[b]Devolopment:[/b]
The base i'm using: Like always Project Insanity
[b]Information:[/b]
I'm alway starting with the combat, because it's an important part of the server. I don't like it when the combat system is bad. I love it to program rsps, because you learn a lot and i hope i will learn more with this project.
[b]Combat Melee:[/b]
- Better combat system - Special attacks - Correct animations - Clipped following in Combat
[b]Combat Magic:[/b]
- Ice barrage - All bloodspells with effect - Autocasting
[b]Combat Range:[/b]
- correct Bolt specials with Gfx - Better range formula's - Bow Specials
[b]Update Log:[/b]
[code]2 july: -Founded base: Project insanity -Fixed some bugs
3 july: -Started with testing the combat system. -The combat system wasn't good, so i rewrote it. -Added clipped npcs, clipped combat, clipped following. -Fixed slayer tower stairs so you need to run the hole slayer tower before clicking the stairs.
4 july: -Added slayer points system with slayer shop. -Rewrote the commands.java, a lot of bugs.
5 july: -Made a better clan system with rankings. -Changed the leave clan button to Clan setup which gives you a multi option for leaving a clean, ranking a member or kicking. -Added a blaming with effect on dagganoths. -Added new slayer teleport (Slayer master, Slayer tower, Slayer dungeon low, Slayer dungeon Mid and slayer dungeon high) -Added some reqs for the slayer teleport, so you need a slayer task for teleporting to the dungeons, and for the high dungeon you need 90 slayer to.
6 july: -Made a helper rank. -Added loyalty titles only for the new ranks like helper. -Added commands for the helper rank. -Added 100 option for buying.
[/code] Pictures coming soon

item.description:

Mikeyzzz:

Thanks.

When i’m back, i continue with this project and add pictures and more updates.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:5, topic:523913”]There is 07rs already for ‘‘no OP’’ items and people can play that.
You really think you can do the competition against jagex’s 07 release?

New items are salt for rsps to stay alive, since 07scape is up.

Just my opinion don’t take it too seariously.

Good Luck though.[/quote]
But i’m not doing a competition vs jagex.
I’m just creating an old school server with a good combat system to make pking active.
Other then that Thanks

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

[center]Place for Banner[/center]

Introduction:

This is Hidden pk an old school based server where you can enjoy playing. The main reason why i’m starting this project is because there are a lot of servers with the new 634 items in it. I remember the days when playing was fun because there were no overpowered items, Wilderness was fun because it’s welfare or barrows pk. And this is what i want to achieve back! A nice old school based server with active pking, bossing and skilling. I had projects started a few months back, but couldn’t complete them because i had no time. But now i have enough time to complete this and keep this thread updated.
[hr]
Progres:

red = not started
yellow = in progress
green = completed

Devolopment:

The base i’m using: Like always Project Insanity

Information:

I’m alway starting with the combat, because it’s an important part of the server. I don’t like it when the combat system is bad.
I love it to program rsps, because you learn a lot and i hope i will learn more with this project.

Combat Melee:

  • Better combat system
  • Special attacks
  • Correct animations
  • Clipped following in Combat

Combat Magic:

  • Ice barrage
  • All bloodspells with effect
  • Autocasting

Combat Range:

  • correct Bolt specials with Gfx
  • Better range formula’s
  • Bow Specials

Update Log:

[code]2 july:
-Founded base: Project insanity
-Fixed some bugs

3 july:
-Started with testing the combat system.
-The combat system wasn’t good, so i rewrote it.
-Added clipped npcs, clipped combat, clipped following.
-Fixed slayer tower stairs so you need to run the hole slayer tower before clicking the stairs.

4 july:
-Added slayer points system with slayer shop.
-Rewrote the commands.java, a lot of bugs.

5 july:
-Made a better clan system with rankings.
-Changed the leave clan button to Clan setup which gives you a multi option for leaving a clean, ranking a member or kicking.
-Added a blaming with effect on dagganoths.
-Added new slayer teleport (Slayer master, Slayer tower, Slayer dungeon low, Slayer dungeon Mid and slayer dungeon high)
-Added some reqs for the slayer teleport, so you need a slayer task for teleporting to the dungeons, and for the high dungeon you need 90 slayer to.

6 july:
-Made a helper rank.
-Added loyalty titles only for the new ranks like helper.
-Added commands for the helper rank.
-Added 100 option for buying.

[/code]
Pictures coming soon
